author: Jean-Pierre
content: I am surprised there has been no night time stealth operation to slip her anchors and tow her away.

author: Doug Bostrom
content: I’m guessing the vessel’s name is a proper noun, as opposed to an adjective, but unfamiliar.Even so, am struck by the irony. It’s like the instructions are printed on the can, but with an error: should have been “Unsafest.” Single hull, laden, abandoned. (◔_◔)
